title.rendered: How Mobile Is Changing Our Life – Infographics

content.rendered:
Check out this great and simple infographics illustrating how the mobile technology has changed our lives over the last several years.

A couple of  mind-blowing facts from the infographics:

  • 43 Americans become smartphone users every minute
  • Tablets are 300% up from the past year – this is the fastest growing device ever created
  • 73% of males don’t go an hour without checking their phone

via pijnz.com
